install.name: RS Cool Mp3 Player
install.author: RS Web Solutions
install.copyright: Copyright (c) 2010-2015 RS Web Solutions - Development Team
install.description: RS Cool Mp3 Player is a flash based minimalistic Mp3 player with a twist, perfect for your website. This is a Joomla extension specially developed for Joomla version 1.5.x. It supports the basic functions of an mp3 player- play, pause, draggable volume bar, sound visualizer. It includes a special sound visualizer that changes when you drag the volume bar.

param.name: rsws_module_width
param.label: Module Width
param.description: Please specify the module width in pixel. (default value: 290)

param.name: rsws_module_margin
param.label: Margin between Player
param.description: If you are listing more than 1 songs, then please specify the gap between 2 songs. (default value: 10)

param.name: rsws_width
param.label: Player Width
param.description: Please specify the Width of a single mp3 player button. (default value: 281)

param.name: rsws_height
param.label: Player Height
param.description: Please specify the Height of a single mp3 player button. (default value: 78)

param.name: rsws_backgroundColor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: Color of the background in hex-code, do not add # (default value: ffffff)

param.name: rsws_autoplay
param.label: Autoplay
param.description: Start playing the song automatically when loaded. This setting will only work if there is only one mp3 song to play (default value: NO)

param.name: rsws_margin
param.label: Margin
param.description: Margin in pixel. (default value: 5)

param.name: rsws_strokeColor
param.label: Stroke Color
param.description: Stroke Color in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 90C84B)

param.name: rsws_fillColor
param.label: Fill Color
param.description: Fill Color in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 414042)

param.name: rsws_backColor
param.label: Button Back Color
param.description: Back Color of Play-Pause Button in hex-code, do not add # (default value: FFFFFF)

param.name: rsws_backOverColor
param.label: Button Back Over Color
param.description: Back Over Color of Play-Pause Button in hex-code, do not add # (default value: DEECBD)

param.name: rsws_signStrokeColor
param.label: Button Sign Stroke Color
param.description: Sign Stroke Color of Play-Pause Button in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 4B4B4B)

param.name: rsws_signFillColor
param.label: Button Sign Fill Color
param.description: Sign Fill Color of Play-Pause Button in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 83B04D)

param.name: rsws_initLevel
param.label: Initial Volume Level
param.description: Initial Volume Level. Any value from 0 to 100. Enter 0 to mute, 100 to maximum volume. (default value: 50)

param.name: rsws_backStrokeColor
param.label: Back Stroke Color
param.description: Back Stroke Color of volume control in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 4B4B4B)

param.name: rsws_backFillColor
param.label: Back Fill Color
param.description: Back Fill Color of volume control in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 83B04D)

param.name: rsws_signColor
param.label: Sign Color
param.description: Sign Color of volume control in hex-code, do not add # (default value: E7E8E9)

param.name: rsws_signOverColor
param.label: Sign Over Color
param.description: Sign Over Color of volume control in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 4B4B4B)

param.name: rsws_percentTextColor
param.label: Percent Text Color
param.description: Color of percentage text of the volume control in hex-code, do not add # (default value: E7E8E9)

param.name: rsws_percentTextmarginX
param.label: Percent Horizontal Margin
param.description: Horizontal margin of percentage text of the volume control in pixel. (default value: 5)

param.name: rsws_percentTextpositionY
param.label: Percent Vertical Position
param.description: Vertical position of percentage text of the volume control, it can be 'top', 'bottom', 'center' or a number (default value: top)

param.name: rsws_visualizerbackColor
param.label: Back Color
param.description: Back Color of visualizer in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 4B4B4B)

param.name: rsws_visualizerwavesColor
param.label: Wave Color
param.description: Wave Color of visualizer in hex-code, do not add # (default value: FFFFFF)

param.name: rsws_artistColor
param.label: Artist Color
param.description: Color of the artist text in hex-code, do not add # (default value: E7E8E9)

param.name: rsws_artistFontSize
param.label: Artist Font Size
param.description: Font Size of the artist text in pixel (default value: 14)

param.name: rsws_songColor
param.label: Song Color
param.description: Color of the song text in hex-code, do not add # (default value: E7E8E9)

param.name: rsws_songFontSize
param.label: Song Font Size
param.description: Font Size of the song text in pixel (default value: 12)

param.name: rsws_artistName
param.label:
Name of Artist(s)

Example:
{Artist A}, {Artist B}
param.description: Specify the name of artists within {}, seperated by comma. (Example: {Artist A}, {Artist B})

param.name: rsws_songName
param.label:
Name of MP3 Song(s)

Example:
{Song A}, {Song B}
param.description: Specify the name of mp3 songs within {}, seperated by comma. (Example: {Song A}, {Song B})

param.name: rsws_songURL
param.label:
Location/URL of Song(s)

Example:
{URL_1}, {URL_2}
param.description: Specify the name of songs within {}, seperated by comma. (Example: {http://www.song.com/mp3/song1.mp3}, {http://www.song.com/mp3/song2.mp3})

param.default:
Troubleshooting
If this module works properly in your website, then these troubleshooting steps are totally not necessary for you. But if you notice some issue like 'Visualizer Wave is not showing properly' or similar, then choose 'Use Exact URL' to 'YES' and set the exact website URL below.

param.name: rsws_use_exact_url
param.label: Use Exact URL
param.description: Set to 'YES' to use the 'Exact URL', otherwise set to 'NO'. (Default: 'NO')

param.name: rsws_exact_url
param.label: Exact URL
param.description: The URL of your website, make sure it is properly formatted. (Example: http://www.yoursite.com/)

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Module Caching

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
